title: Reese Witherspoon cuts a chic look as she joins Jennifer Aniston at The Morning Show premiere in NYC
text:
Reese Witherspoon and Jennifer Aniston are set to be the face of a new streaming platform, with the upcoming launch of Apple TV+.

They star as talk show hosts in The Morning Show, which premieres with the launch on November 1.

The co-stars looked chic in black Tuesday as they attended the show's premiere at the Paley Center in New York City.

Co-stars: Reese Witherspoon and Jennifer Aniston looked chic in black Tuesday as they attended The Morning Show premiere at the Paley Center in New York City

Witherspoon stunned in a little black dress with long sleeves, which was ruched at the waist, featuring a ruffled feature draping down the skirt.

The dress was paired with black fishnet stockings and some pointed white leather stilettos, featuring a black strap.

The actress wore a black knee-length double-breasted suit jacket as she arrived at the premiere.

She was joined on the red carpet by Aniston, with whom she stars in the new Apple TV+ series.

Witherspoon plays Bradley, an activist and journalist who lands a role on a morning talk show with seasoned co-host Alex, played by Aniston.

The ladies, who previously played sisters on Friends, shared a hug as the reunited on the carpet.

Aniston also cut a chic look in black, donning a long tuxedo jacket, which featured a feminine silhouette.

She wore it over a matching black dress, which featured lapels and a zipper running up the chest.
